column3:
“So far my face has melted, I've gotten lost in my own bed, I've contemplated the possibility that I may be a prophet, I've felt more clear headed than ever before and I've run out of descriptors.

Fuckin magic carpet ride.
A whole new freaking world.”

“Mmmm...cherry indeed. This is hands down the best smelling weed I have ever had. If I had my eyes closed and were to smell this in a bottle, I'd bet my bottom dollar it were a basket of chocolate covered cherries. Any other marijuana-related scent is nowhere to be found, except hints of fresh flowers if ones' mind dares to wander that deep into it.  Cherry Ak47 is on a whole new level though; I found myself coming ba...”

“This is a very potent strain. It is listed as a Hybrid, but it isn't definitely Indica dominant. This weed gets you stoned, the onset is relatively quick, and for about two hours you get to a ride a very smooth Indica buzz. A very strong analgesic pain relief, strong body high and buzz, very psychoactive and heady. Thoughts are cloudy, reaction times are slowed. Definitely a good amount of couch lock here. This is an...”

“This my new favorite. Makes me feel Super-normal. Wonderful head-high and perfectly functional. Of course I medicate via microdosing, titrating to the best effect, rather than just getting baked. That is so 70's.”

“After a few tokes, I was completely in a dream. I kept checking my watch because time was going by so slowly. 5 minutes would be like 25 minutes. Definatly wiped out my anxiety. I could stare at the ceil for a long time and not get bored. Unfortunately, I couldn't really walk, and I couldn't talk at all. Some times I'd get laughing fits.”

“Currently loading a bowl of such glory... upon opening the container im punched in the face with a sweet and juicy, yet sour cherry aroma. 
Sticky and stinky

after a couple puffs... I'm tasting cherry with a big earthy taste but the sour of the ak fills your lungs with pressure and is a smooth after taste to balance the experience 

I'm feeling like my ears are ringing like I just shot an ak 47 without ear plugs. I ...”

“Very strong body high.  Couch-lock is almost guaranteed with this strain, but if you need relief from pain or insomnia, this would be a good strain to pick.  Unlike a lot of the strains I usually buy, Cherry-AK is definitely indica-dominant, and it really helped with my insomnia.  Unfortunately, one hit was enough to demotivate me for the rest of the afternoon, so this is a night-time only strain for me.  Definitely ...”

“90% Sativa - Cherry Ak-47 (Special Phenotype of AK-47 (Colombia x Mexico x Thailand x Afghanistan))

This was exactly what I could have wanted and more. The smell, taste and effect where unique. It is true. It smelled just like the name. Cherry Sweet & Bold HIGH. It hits right away. You just want to do something on this HIGH, like a million back flips or something. But there is a very slow and light CREEPER Effect ...”
“Hey Kool Aid! The flavor of Cherry AK-47 brought about the memories of the full red pitcher. The creeper" in true form
column4: it taste wonderfully cherry with a potency that will put you on your back. This strain provided strong medicine for my MS fatigue
column5: but unlike sativas that feel like a shot of espresso
column6: this strain will slowly drift you into a sweet sleep. Not recommended for active days

column3: “Big League Extracts- Cherry AC DC"  clear slab.  Clean

“For 10/g, this was still pretty good quality medicine. It is powerful but not as powerful as girilla glue which is kinda cool if you knkw what i mean... GG can make me so high that my body is vibrating and tingly which I don't mind but this is a lot more mellow. Smells great and tastes great. Its ok" for sleep but great for pain and appetite. Had some very stimulating conversation after a bowl or 2 as well. Great st...”"

“Due to stresses of work and traffic (I live in L.A.) I've been mostly into indicas, since they really help calm and alleviate the days load. But I wanted to get a good mind trip while producing music , since indicas never really do that, they just make me stuck lol.  So I was suggested to try cherry AK , and fuck what a great experience! The high is smooth and instant that allowed me to stay alert yet allow the body ...”

“Nice cherry taste.  Euphoria hits first with a strong head rush.  Tingly feeling throughout the body follows, when that clears I notice the headache and back pain I had a few minutes ago has subsided.  A very happy head high, sort of floaty and dizzy, combined with a kind of lazy warm body high.  Finally as the rush settles, there is a very calm, relaxing high that's just a bit fuzzy-headed - good for relaxing but no...”
“Very smooth hits. Old school flavor as it is more on the earthy side. Great hybrid that feels more like a sativa.”

“Be careful with this strain.  I've been smoking for a while and this is a definite couch lock and if you're chain smoking this, you'll have a hard time keeping up. This is by far the strongest strain I've ever had, and not saying it's not a good strain, but too much and you'll get sick of it. This made me really dizzy. Never experienced dizziness in my life with weed. Good for going to sleep. MAJOR munchies. I went t...”

“Tasted really strong and cherry, but was found getting paranoid mostly. It did help ease some stress but made me fidgity over other stuff. I,m not a fan, but I can see why lot of people like it. Its pretty potent stuff.”

“Tasted really strong and cherry, but was found getting paranoid mostly. It did help ease some stress but made me fidgity over other stuff. I,m not a fan, but I can see why lot of people like it. Its pretty potent stuff.”

“I really like this strain. I have used it as a solid weekend daytime go-to since available in this area (Bmore/DC). Perfect post run smoke, great for housework, or a day on the trails. This bud promotes relaxed well-being and good feelings without a lazy body. Totally digging it.”
“Great for my arthritis pain and helps me sleep too.”
“it's really great to help you relax and chill.  helps to relax the muscles, helps with my anxiety too.”
“Mellow vibes”
“I got this from a Dispensary as a concentrate , and the flavor was delicious 😋 it really does taste like Cherries 🍒 . Careful with this strain ,cus it was very potent. 🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥”
“Incredible physical sensation. Sex while on it is incredible.”

“I definitely agree on the strain highlight statement: Cherry AK-47 'creeps' up from a cerebral effect to a complete body sensation." I like this strain a lot for activity followed by rest -- video games transitioning in to TV or movie watching. I also like Shark Shock for the same purpose
column5: but Cherry AK is still a formidable strain.”"

column3: “I got this from a Dispensary as a concentrate , and the flavor was delicious 😋 it really does taste like Cherries 🍒 . Careful with this strain ,cus it was very potent. 🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥”
“Incredible physical sensation. Sex while on it is incredible.”

“As others have stated, this strain is a delight to smell. But whoa, I got super paranoid and I'm one of those people that's always a rock in crisis so that was unsettling. High came on really fast and on a scale of 1-10 after one bong hit, I was an 8.5. So definitely a little much for my taste. Had a similar experience with the AK-47 but Cherry Pie is one of my go to's so I think it's just the AK part of this that's ...”
“WOW.  What else is there to say?  This is the BOMB strain.... the best relief yet!  FIRE!”

“I have a batch with 24.78% THC but only 0.14% CBD, I've seen this strain advertised as indica dominant, as a 50/50 balance, and the pheno I have right now says it's sativa dominant but for the most part feels like it starts out as a VERY BRIEF sativa dom hybrid and then the indica body high creeps in leaving you very relaxed. The higher the THC then the more tired and relaxed you're going to be regardless of whether ...”
“Comes on in relaxed way Nice meds, mellow, creative,slow walking Joan"!”"
“awesome strain. awake, happy, anxiety relief, and all around excellent. and it's delicious. favorite strain now no question asked”
“The high is much like a dab in its clearer headed nature. You will feel high" not "stoned" I do frequently get headaches from extended burning of this strain”"
“relaxing, anti-depression, -anxious, sensitive, stimulating; however, absent-minded, had troubles with concentration, not to mention be creative, should not be used before duties.”
“This shit makes my ass sleepy and lazy 😂”

“On a week outing and searching for some Sunset Sherbet we wandered into a store in the Humboldt area and not only secured the SS, but also some Cherry AK.
The evening started with a little SS.  This is good.  This is good on it's own.
Progressed to the Cherry.  Jumpin Jesus, this is real good.
After a couple reloads on the tiny travel vape my wife and I had one hell of a great evening-night.  
Stopped back and picked...”

“As others have stated, this strain is a delight to smell. But whoa, I got super paranoid and I'm one of those people that's always a rock in crisis so that was unsettling. High came on really fast and on a scale of 1-10 after one bong hit, I was an 8.5. So definitely a little much for my taste. Had a similar experience with the AK-47 but Cherry Pie is one of my go to's so I think it's just the AK part of this that's ...”
“Comes on in relaxed way Nice meds, mellow, creative,slow walking Joan"!”"
“awesome strain. awake, happy, anxiety relief, and all around excellent. and it's delicious. favorite strain now no question asked”
“Awesome 👌 words hardly describe”

“I'll admit that I'm a major nerd when it comes to marijuana. It's nice to know for real what you're about to smoke. Needless to say when visiting relatives in Denver I definitely made sure I went to a dispensary, so much better than a parking lot. All the strains where labeled with lots of details...surely I'm in heaven! After a lot of browsing and talking to the extremely friendly budtenders, I decided on Cherry AK-...”
“WOW.  What else is there to say?  This is the BOMB strain.... the best relief yet!  FIRE!”
“Awesome 👌 words hardly describe”

“As others have stated, this strain is a delight to smell. But whoa, I got super paranoid and I'm one of those people that's always a rock in crisis so that was unsettling. High came on really fast and on a scale of 1-10 after one bong hit, I was an 8.5. So definitely a little much for my taste. Had a similar experience with the AK-47 but Cherry Pie is one of my go to's so I think it's just the AK part of this that's ...”

“Cherry AK is some potent stuff. It is a heavy-hitting indica, and you will become the couch.

Euphoria ensues and you get an amazing body high. The best part about this strain is its potency. Where usually, an eighth lasts me about a week, 3 grams of this strain lasted me for over a month. 

1/3 of a small nug gets me to outer space. This strain is strong, potent, and also gets you very aroused. 9.5/10

Make sure you...”
“Very clean high; great during the day; still able to be productive with your work, although I got quite distracted; not the best strain for watching comedy movies”

“Wow, can you say potent? 
I had given up on trying to get really stoned. My tolerance was up and No matter what method I tried it would just be a sedative level. 

The taste is really good, super cherry and berry. 

As far as the high, it was pretty straight forward. Pretty focused. It did make me feel pretty dizzy and nauseous but after like 10 minutes you’ll be in psychedelic bliss. 
Made me really horny too. Then ...”
“awesome strain. awake, happy, anxiety relief, and all around excellent. and it's delicious. favorite strain now no question asked”
“Pairs well with rum and coke.”
“WOW.  What else is there to say?  This is the BOMB strain.... the best relief yet!  FIRE!”
“Pretty much the perfect high!  Zero anxiety, relaxed, and giggly!  Still very aware, but just don't give a shit...Very well balanced!!  And it tastes delicious!”
“Awesome 👌 words hardly describe”
“Comes on in relaxed way Nice meds, mellow, creative,slow walking Joan"!”"
“This strain gave me a nice happy high. I was able to get focused on the project at hand. Also my constant pain was dulled significantly.”
“awesome strain. awake, happy, anxiety relief, and all around excellent. and it's delicious. favorite strain now no question asked”
“The high is much like a dab in its clearer headed nature. You will feel high" not "stoned" I do frequently get headaches from extended burning of this strain”"
“Pairs well with rum and coke.”
“Really nice high, slight paranoia. Overall enjoyable.”
“Pretty much the perfect high!  Zero anxiety, relaxed, and giggly!  Still very aware, but just don't give a shit...Very well balanced!!  And it tastes delicious!”
“The high is much like a dab in its clearer headed nature. You will feel high" not "stoned" I do frequently get headaches from extended burning of this strain”"
“awesome strain. awake, happy, anxiety relief, and all around excellent. and it's delicious. favorite strain now no question asked”

“This is some potent bud for sure.  It's got the potential for couch-lock, but definitely good for either day or night time smoke.  It eases you between a cerebral, reflective high (for me) to a heavy body high that just lulls me to bed.  Some hunger in there as well.”

“Was looking for an uplifting strain and Cherry AK was suggested. Very impressed with this batch, has a sweet taste and then a bit of an earthy zing, smells like ammonia in a good way. Gave me that happy high I was missing in my life. 🌵”
“WOW.  What else is there to say?  This is the BOMB strain.... the best relief yet!  FIRE!”

“These genetics are outstanding! I couldn't pass up on this rare pheno of AK-47. It's has tons of appeal. Beautiful lime green buds covered in resin. The cannabinoid profile works wonders on the mind and body. Cerebral and body effects extremely enjoyable from this crafty hybrid.  Cheers.”

“As others have stated, this strain is a delight to smell. But whoa, I got super paranoid and I'm one of those people that's always a rock in crisis so that was unsettling. High came on really fast and on a scale of 1-10 after one bong hit, I was an 8.5. So definitely a little much for my taste. Had a similar experience with the AK-47 but Cherry Pie is one of my go to's so I think it's just the AK part of this that's ...”
“Comes on in relaxed way Nice meds, mellow, creative,slow walking Joan"!”"
“Yum. More a relax and enjoy strain than a pain killer, but didn't slouch there either.”
“Although this is a sativa dominant strain, I felt very tired after smoking it. But overall, it was very smooth and produced a decent high.”
“oil”

“I like the energy and focus that I get from CAK-47. Usually, this type of sativa-dominant feeling would cause adverse anxiety, but I am calm and can sleep with it. I like this very much. It’s okay for dull, but not sharp pain.”
“Made me so hungry and paranoid. Ate a lot, sitting on my couch with a bloated stomach. Plus I keep going through thoughts and scenarios that give me anxiety. Not for me unfortunately.”
“Happiest weed I've had in months. Warm feeling in the gut. I just can't help but be happy.”
“Should update information Flow Kana has a cherry AK at slightly over 20% THC”

“The smell is undeniable... and when you smoke, it hits hard.  The aroma is so nice and smells like cherries and pine... I've had AK-47 but never have I had the Cherry AK.... It is a great end of the day smoke, and will leave you feeling light headed and also ready to sleep if needed.  This strain is also good for day time, if you can handle the effects... In my opinion, this hybrid cross is very special and rare.  I ...”

“From: MEDITHRIVE SF
This shit tasted like cherry tea! By far the best tasting tree I've smoked.”
“Nice head high with rushes of tingling down arms and legs. Head in the clouds type high.”
“sativa leaning ak47 and it's really good..”

“AMAZING!!!
It does creep up but it creeps up all at once. The smell was delightful, I was caught up on this while having to drive one of my in laws. I think I played it off pretty well lol. Once I was alone again relaxing, it had me locked on my bed catching up on my Netflix shows. 

🔫🔫🔫🔫🔫🔫🔫🔫”
“Good stain if you are at home and comfortable but made me super paranoid and anxious the second I left the house. Did not like the feeling”
“Meh. 🤷”
“Oh me oh my, beautiful journey...no anxiety, just peace.”

“Overall this strain is fucking amazing, as soon as I opened the jar I was punched in the face with cherry and an after effect of spicy herbal type scents. And of course, it taste how it smells and the high is other worldly. Amazing strain”
“Let me tell u I was on Pluto🚀🤟🏾”
“Awesome daytime strain! Makes me happy!”

“This is a wonderful ‘4th gear Cruze’ kind of vibe. I love the flavor, Cerebral yet pain relieving, elevation. I pair it with dark chocolate or a nice black cup O’ Joe:) 
I would say Cherry AK is one of my Top 5 favorite strains.”
“what a day strain or evening at the club strain”

“This strain put my body to sleep but kept my brain awake in other words I was stuck to the point I could hardly move the taste is really strange but in a good way it taste nothing like the cherry pie strain”

“Purchased the State Flower Cherry AK at Apothecarium LV - one of my favorite dispensaries so far. Method - Pax vape Flavor - deep dark cherries, with a hint of dark chocolate Head - Clear and crisp, bright, airy and optimistic. Body - Relaxed and calm but in an uplifted way feeling lighter. Eye relief. (Felt as though I could see or read better) Great for those who have inflammation, anxiety, depression and add/adhd....”

“My delivery service mislabeled this as a SATIVA(??hell no!!), it’s definitely an Indica heavy hybrid.  Cherry AK gives me more couch lock than most straight Indicas.  I did not really enjoy the high, too oppressive and heavy for me. Smell and flavor are decent, I’ll steer clear of this strain in the future”

“I LOVE this weed! Definitely in my top three, if not my favorite strain. Every time I smoke cherry ak I laugh my ass off and the world becomes so colorful. It's a very euphoric high and amazing to smoke with friends. I noticed it also made me feel very appreciative of my friends and life. Overall amazing strain”

“Wow this is a great strain! Smells amazing and it has a great cherry and earthy taste. After medicating I was smacked with a wonderful high that had me locked into the couch. Great for anxiety and pain relief.”

“Had this strain in Barcelona. It was most def on the sativa side. It was the most intense head high I had ever experienced. Smoked a pure J of this stuff and then was left to wander the streets of Barcelona. Luckily, I found some food, and a way back to where I was staying. One of the most psychoactive strains I've had.”
“destructive!”
“Hands down one of the best strains I've tried recently. this high is really mellow and laid back. anxiety is practically nonexistent right now. just putting in my ear buds and chilling”
“Very potent strain, that starts out euphoric and uplifting and ends up being very relaxing. Some strains actually taste mildly like cherry. Lots of red hairs and crystals!”
“after about .5 of a Gram.  I was walking home and I was completely tripping.  if felt like my eyes were zooming out and my arms were extending out. definitely one of the funniest high I've had.”

“Dude!!!!!! I got all sorts of heaviness from this strain. I stared at the wall for more than five minutes for the first time in years. I never zone out that hard anymore. Definitely smells good when you vape it too. Highly recommend.”

“Light color; dense, sticky buds that break clean. Incredible smell, very floral with a light citrus fruit tone. I would happily have this around all day.

Really nice flavor. Wood with a hint of cherry. Strong without being harsh.

Quick euphoria with gradual pain relief. A clear sativa high that starts at the top of the head and works its way down. Great for anxiety and depression. Relaxes without locking you down. ...”
“This is a Great strain. I got it from NACCC. I have migraines and I am a seizure patient.  This is  a relaxing. I love it.”
“Hands down one of the best strains I've tried recently. this high is really mellow and laid back. anxiety is practically nonexistent right now. just putting in my ear buds and chilling”
“I'm giving it a 10 because of the smell, maybe one of the best strains I've ever smelt, got it from MEDITHRIVE in San Francisco.”
“Excellent strain! Uplifting, sweet and very smooth.”
“Very potent strain, that starts out euphoric and uplifting and ends up being very relaxing. Some strains actually taste mildly like cherry. Lots of red hairs and crystals!”
“after about .5 of a Gram.  I was walking home and I was completely tripping.  if felt like my eyes were zooming out and my arms were extending out. definitely one of the funniest high I've had.”
“This is a Great strain. I got it from NACCC. I have migraines and I am a seizure patient.  This is  a relaxing. I love it.”

“Got this at Medithrive and I was pleasantly surprised by how good it is. I smoked it pretty hard and it tasted pretty good. I didn't have any major coughing issues with it. Then about 2 minutes later, I  had a nice long mellow head rush. Then came a nice body high which got me relaxed to watch Adult Swim. So yea, this is some good chill stuff!!”
“I'm giving it a 10 because of the smell, maybe one of the best strains I've ever smelt, got it from MEDITHRIVE in San Francisco.”
“Excellent strain! Uplifting, sweet and very smooth.”
“Excelente y muy suave pa la garganta”

“Very nice if you want to relieve stress. Very potent, and super sweet smelling. I typically used it after work, and it definitely helped calm to mind and relax the body. 
Will repeat. 8/10”
“loving this second time i boght this from the dispo. On point on the flavor. Definetly a daytime strain”

“I'm an Indica guy, & I was given a free pre-roll of Cherry AK-47, which is a hybrid. To my surprise, I loved the strain. It's hands down, the best tasting strain I've ever had, and actually does taste like cherries. I felt my mood get elevated, and had an overall great experience. I experienced a head high that was just right, and a slight body high as well. For some reason every time I smoked it, I felt it was a cla...”
“difficulty a good mix of indixa and stativa. great taste. a little harsh”
“Having chronic back pain this strain is great to take the edge off. It's a lot more of a body high for me which is great so you can still go out and perform regular tasks.”
“Makes me sleepy/tired but tastes great.”

“very pleasurable experience.  taking care of my pain, and making this review a little difficult to complete.  Nice sweet taste, but my sample was a little on the dry side.  I am getting a little more dry eye from this strain then most strains.  The pain and stomach upset almost disappear after a few minutes.”
“Picked up some of this in San Fran. Wanted to get absolutely blasted and this did the trick although I had more than enough energy to explore afterwards, which was a plus.”
“amazing bud”

“this is a very tasty strain for sure!   hits the head first for sure kind of sneaks up on you but after it does you'll notice the Body sensation next which feels really good at the end of a long day for sure!  So kick back and try some cherry  AK-47 !!!”
“It’s been a journey. Just listen to your favorite song and you’ll travel to space on a rocket with Moses.”

“This strain could either have you wired enough to read a lot but not retain much information OR pass tf out within 30 minutes and wake up a little dizzy. I had the craziest dreams while high on this. Not necessarily the best for the body, but it mellows you right out for sure.”
“holy shyt. this strain is no joke. you will absolutely taste the cherry when smoking this shit.”
“A pretty amazing strain. Other than the overwhelming cherry smell there are hints of what almost seems like an earthy lavender. Great to smoke during the day.”
“The amazing smell and taste of this taste makes it super memorable while also being an exceptional hybrid. Highly recommend this strain for many different situations”

“Off top the smell is very strong and lovely , very soft texture bud , sweet taste , with a hint of pine . Good strain to watch Netflix to , high hits you pretty fast , good all around weed . I can’t really get over how good it tastes . One of the best I ever tasted , I high recommend it . 🌝”
“just mixed this weed with some blue dream and im feelin dreamy cherry baby”
“creeps up on you but you end up feeling energetic”

“Fantastic flower. Light lime green buds smell of cherry and fuel with a hint of wood. Great slow creeping that starts of light and turns to a strong relaxing euphoric sensation. Sweet wood taste on inhale cherry on exhale smooth draw great for afternoon to evening use.”
“strong and very nice..not my type but still really really 5 outta 5..”
“aefs fa”
“Good and strong taste. I enjoyed it and will like to hit more.”
“It really smells like cherries starts with the cerebral hi there Rose down your entire body remains with a nice body high and not a tremendous tiring come down”
“BOMB !!! :)) picked up some from the clinic last night. top shelf!”
“Great strain for the day and helps me with my epilepsy.”
“makes me very energetic! not sure if it tasted like cherries, however.”

“These big ol' crystalized nugs are so sweet and smoke so smooth. I am in love all over again. I felt like I was astrally projecting. Definitely great for pain relief but not great for trying to focus.”
“Beautiful, rich, well rounded taste, smell, and high. Numbs my body good, there is a little tingle sensation very creepy in the head overall very nice. 😎⛽️”
“Very good smell . Puts me in a grounding sensation.”
“very fruitful & juicy”

“The smell is undeniable... and when you smoke, it hits hard.  The aroma is so nice and smells like cherries and pine... I've had AK-47 but never have I had the Cherry AK.... It is a great end of the day smoke, and will leave you feeling light headed and also ready to sleep if needed.  This strain is also good for day time, if you can handle the effects... In my opinion, this hybrid cross is very special and rare.  I ...”
“Reminds me of the original AK47 but more stony. Definitely cherry-flowery smelling buds. Good day time strain if you suffer from anxiety and stress.”

“Forgive me Leafly, It's been a while since my last review....  I must say I am impressed with this one.  You see I haven't come across a strain that was worth writing about.  That does not mean I was not looking or smoking. I have, a lot!  This one is good for anxiety and relaxing. No cares appear. Well they may appear, put really do they matter at this point. Nope, just chill time.   Just good old fashion mellowness...”
“Really loved the taste of this strain, i have A+ flavor!" written in my hand written notes..

column1: I also have the word velvety written down under taste
not the greatest bud structure or appearance for this cut
column2: but the very obviously and and deep smell combined with the A effects and A+ taste make this 5 stars.”"

column3: “bad taste but very giggly not sleepy but definitely not energizing”
“one of my personal favorite strains. not only does it have an enjoyable aroma but it also has a functional and extremely enjoyable high.”
“nice body and head high”
“Amazing”

“another great hybrid strain. hybrids are always my favorite due to the nice balanced feeling they give me. Cherry AK47 has a great cherry lemon lime flavor and leaves me feeling relaxed and very talkative.”

“AMAZING!!!
It does creep up but it creeps up all at once. The smell was delightful, I was caught up on this while having to drive one of my in laws. I think I played it off pretty well lol. Once I was alone again relaxing, it had me locked on my bed catching up on my Netflix shows. 

🔫🔫🔫🔫🔫🔫🔫🔫”

“I can see why some might give it a 5 star. My reason for dropping 1 star is the taste is not as good as smell. In a bong that might change because it in a pipe it's a little harsh. 

The good is that it does smell like cherry or possible lemon. I have it in a sealed mason jar and it smells up my room. It's white crystals make the buds  look like a molded cheese. 

The high. I'm a returning smoker, with loads of pain ...”
“Nice variety that starts slow and builds to a nice feeling.  The sativa keeps your mind engaged yet stress-free.”

“Overall this strain is fucking amazing, as soon as I opened the jar I was punched in the face with cherry and an after effect of spicy herbal type scents. And of course, it taste how it smells and the high is other worldly. Amazing strain”

“I LOVE this weed! Definitely in my top three, if not my favorite strain. Every time I smoke cherry ak I laugh my ass off and the world becomes so colorful. It's a very euphoric high and amazing to smoke with friends. I noticed it also made me feel very appreciative of my friends and life. Overall amazing strain”

“This stuff smells and tastes amazing. the high is balanced, euphoric, and relaxed. it settles into a comfortable body high and helps chill you out after a long day. the smell will have you coming back to sniff it just as much as the high will have you coming back to smoke it.”
“Fucking awesome, thats it. Good to fuck around chill and laugh for a long ass time !”

“Amazing smell like dank with sweet cherries and lemons, light green bud, dense nugs and a high that is both stimulating at first, with more relaxing indica traits coming on after like 
15-20 minutes”
“A nice heady euphoric strain. Although it dint help my anxiety much it did help me to focus and relax some. The flavor is amazing cherry and delicious.”
“Tastes like cherry at lower temps when vaping, but this is a taste strain. It was only ok.”

“This is an extremely awesome, versatile strain...It works as an aphrodisiac after 1-2 bowls...If you continue smoking it will completely relax you, but it will not leave you with lethargic for a long period of time. Great Strain for relaxing, & romance. It also mixes well with other strains”
“Amazing flavor and smell. Probably my new favorite. Super chill and laid back mood.”

“My delivery service mislabeled this as a SATIVA(??hell no!!), it’s definitely an Indica heavy hybrid.  Cherry AK gives me more couch lock than most straight Indicas.  I did not really enjoy the high, too oppressive and heavy for me. Smell and flavor are decent, I’ll steer clear of this strain in the future”

“Wow this is a great strain! Smells amazing and it has a great cherry and earthy taste. After medicating I was smacked with a wonderful high that had me locked into the couch. Great for anxiety and pain relief.”

“Super wonderful high. Very relaxed and stress free. Quite a head high but can become a very pleasant body high as well. I organized the shit out of some stuff when on it. Time does seem to go by very slowly though. Also, can be good for helping you go to sleep.”

“I have always thought to assess the characteristics of weed by their psychoactive feeling, but I can say for the first time, I really appreciated the taste and smoothness of smoking this. It was so incredibly smooth, there was absolutely no burn or harshness to the smoke.  It almost had a slight cool sensation going in.  As far as the psychoactive effects that I've noticed, it's a little slower to set in than many of...”
“Really potent and tasty. NOT a very motivating strain. good for staying in and going to sleep at a reasonable hour. Body buzz lasts longer than expected. (7/10) ain't bad.”

“By Marigold. GH. Bought a $20 eight from Sparc, and it's a great deal. Stoney. Really pleased with the hybrid effect. Doubt I'll pick up any GH (greenhouse) for more than that in the future though. (Promo deal)”

“holy sh*t, couch yes, hungry yes, sleep yes eventually, if you go easy you can enjoy this stuff all day, music/movie or whatever, this is one of those strains where time flies by, rainy day or just a day by yourself this is where it's at”
“The cut I received was sub par on my rating system. Still the taste and smell of the smoke was delicious , with a ok" high. 6/10”"

“A nice sativa high that creeps up. I tried a 15% THC batch. The cherry flavor was very subdued. But a very cerebral high. Does allow one to get the chores done with fun. A great daytime strain. Though it does sneak up on you. A nice touch of a body high.  Overall, a very low key strain.”

“This is my #1 favorite strain so far. It makes me SO happy, giggly, playful, talkative, silly, energetic and never makes me hungry or sleepy! I don't feel creative or focused, but I am having a great time! I would recommend this for going out to a carnival or some other active fun activity. We watched Braveheart and it was the best. day. ever. lol! I kept just feeling like I am the happiest I've ever been. It's reall...”

“This is truly an amazing strain, I smoked about 2 joints with a friend and we were both on a different planet for a while. It's easy to loose focus and drift away but you can also concentrate on something and get it done. After energy went down we had a calming subtle body high that put me right to sleep. Easily in my top 5.”
“It tastes real good with a hint of cherry, no lie. It's a slow creeper with a body and head high that gives a long medium high.”
“Very calm relaxed background high. Good to take the ease off etc. two thumbs up!!”
“good daytime. fun and strong”

“Great smell and taste like cherries, IMO the dark cherries. After only a few tokes, I was high. Uplifting and very relaxing. I had very little munchies, probably about normal since I ate dinner as usual, except it tasted better.  What I really craved was coffee, and sometimes cigarettes. Even if you are too tired to sleep
column4: you will. If you are watching movies, this is good for drama and sci-fi. This high lasts seve...”

column3: “got in Portland after brillz”
“uplifting with a high quality taste”
“very smooth”
“Amazing body relaxation.”
“Like the smell and the high. Really helps with my lower back pain also! Luv!”
“Really sets off nervous habits. Leaves you feeling sluggish yet anxious. However, it does make you feel more curious and insightful.”
“Smooth high, uplifting and euphoric”

“Looks = 8/10. Smell and taste = 9/10. High = 7/10. This is a good strain, but probably not my first choice. It was a clear-headed high that still made me feel quite happy, relaxed, and tingly. The high definitely feels like a true hybrid at least for me. For the looks, it looks like any other high-quality weed. The smell and taste though are phenomenal. It's super pungent and fruity and can stink up an entire room fo...”

“I like the energy and focus that I get from CAK-47. Usually, this type of sativa-dominant feeling would cause adverse anxiety, but I am calm and can sleep with it. I like this very much. It’s okay for dull, but not sharp pain.”
“I love this sativa leaning hybrid. It gets me feeling more uplifted, happy, talkative, creative, and at ease. Helps with my back pain and social anxiety. perfect daytime strain”

“Ok so.. smoking this by myself was  a real mood booster, stress reliever.  Now smoking this awesome cherry-Ak47 with good company = a great time.  It had us loud and giggly.  Smoke was smooth and tasty.  Would definitely recommend this and purchase again.  It Will have your eyes dry and low lol.”
“Good strain. let's you relax, but gives you energy at the same time. Definitely helps you sleep.”
“Should update information Flow Kana has a cherry AK at slightly over 20% THC”
“Good even mellow buzz to say the least, Perfect for staying up late and watching the Meteor Shower tonight”

“If you're expecting to be functional this is NOT the strain for you. Absolutely only for days off and night time. It really fogged my head out, and not in a good way. Good for pain and sleep though, not for day time use at all. Horrible couch lock and laziness associated with this strain. Very powerful on the indica side.”
“once you get past the taste it is not bad I like a flower that won't get me stuck in my head”
“This stuff is FIRE! Knock you on your ass fire. It's good stuff and the aroma is intoxicating”

“This strain put my body to sleep but kept my brain awake in other words I was stuck to the point I could hardly move the taste is really strange but in a good way it taste nothing like the cherry pie strain”
“what a day strain or evening at the club strain”
“Awesome daytime strain! Makes me happy!”
“Let me tell u I was on Pluto🚀🤟🏾”
“Oh me oh my, beautiful journey...no anxiety, just peace.”
“really hairy and crystally”
“Meh. 🤷”
“Good stain if you are at home and comfortable but made me super paranoid and anxious the second I left the house. Did not like the feeling”
“sativa leaning ak47 and it's really good..”
“Nice head high with rushes of tingling down arms and legs. Head in the clouds type high.”

“This is a wonderful ‘4th gear Cruze’ kind of vibe. I love the flavor, Cerebral yet pain relieving, elevation. I pair it with dark chocolate or a nice black cup O’ Joe:) 
I would say Cherry AK is one of my Top 5 favorite strains.”

“From: MEDITHRIVE SF
This shit tasted like cherry tea! By far the best tasting tree I've smoked.”
“Happiest weed I've had in months. Warm feeling in the gut. I just can't help but be happy.”
“Made me so hungry and paranoid. Ate a lot, sitting on my couch with a bloated stomach. Plus I keep going through thoughts and scenarios that give me anxiety. Not for me unfortunately.”

“this weed really fucks me up in a great way. I was skeptical to try it with the other reviews I had read but went for it anyways. Glad I did because I love it. I mean... I'm high enough to be writing this review lol”
“it was good..really like mix of durban gdp and ak..”
“this variety of the cherry ak-47 is phenomenal.it is the best strain i have ever been blessed with.it's medicine.”
“WOW. OUT OF THIS WORLD. very cerebral.”
“Weed is good”
“it not that bad it tastes great!!! but didn't get the job done”
